description:
Ene is the number 6 member of the Blindfold group. She is the first non-human member of the group.
Her ability is "Open". The ability to give her immortality. even if she is deleted from PC, she appears again when connected to internet.
She was transferred to Shintarou`s PC two years ago and started living in it, Constantly calling Shintarou as "Goshujin" (master).
Shintarou doesn`t seem to enjoy having her on his PC, since she deletes his files, changes his passwords and renames his folders, just like a virus.
Ene was originally human who mysteriously died at the same time with her best friend, Haruka. She woke up in a cyberbody and guises herself under the name of Ene. She is well aware of her former life and has her memories. She transferred to Shintarou`s PC to cheer him up after the sudden death of herself and Haruka, alongside with Ayano`s Suicide which happened After.
She calling Shintarou as "Goshujin", is due to a Promise she made when she was a human.
Her songs are: "Jinzou Enemy" (Artificial Enemy), which is about Ene`s everyday struggles with Shintarou, and "Ene no Dennou Kiko" (Ene`s Cyber Journey) Which tells the story of her ending up as a cybergirl.
name: Ene
